and a great place for sports.

Viladecans has a population of 75.000. The city is beautiful because of its beach and its streets, which are full of markets. It is nice to walk around.
In winter the weather is warm and the summer is wonderful but very hot.
Viladecans is famous for sports. There are great athletes of the “Athletic Marche” and marathon runners representing Spain of the Olympic Games. You will also find big enthusiasm for baseball because in the Barcelona 1992 Olympics Games it was recognised as an official sport.
The people of Viladecans are very friendly and mainly belong to the working middle class.
There’s an area called “La Rambla”, where a lot of outdoor bars and restaurants are.
